text: Margaret Kerry (born May 11, 1929) is an American actress and radio host. She was best known for her work as the model for Tinker Bell in the 1953 Walt Disney Pictures animated feature, Peter Pan. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1929 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American stage actors Category:American radio personalities Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:Models from Los Angeles Category:Disney actors
title: Margaret Kerry
